message.body: Where are you watching the games today?
I was just going to watch them at home
Its crazy that that dude broke neymar's back yesterday
I was thinking of going out for the game but i don't have the money at the moment
Ok I may just watch it in west Philly somewhere. Maybe we can meet up for the finals
The Colombia Brazil game was crazy
Yeah certainly
I still wish Colombia was able to equalize at the end. Now Brazil will be facing the Germans without 2 of their best players
Yeah the ref lost control of that game like five minutes in
Yeah i was hoping Colombia would equalize as well. Cesar should have been red carded for that tackle when the guy was in on goal
There could have been so many cards in that game that were not called
Yeah for sure. That game set the record for most fouls committed during a world cup game
Fuck, well I guess the giant argentine gym teacher wasn't as good as everyone thought he would be
Hahaha
But really it says a lot about how average the Brazilian team is this year, the fact that they had to foul so much and barely squeak by with really narrow wins
Its funny, i feel like a lot of refs in these later rounds have been really hesitant to card people which seems like a bad plan
Yeah it should really be consistent across all games but you try carding a Brazilian player in the World Cup in Brazil, I would be scared for my life and the life of my family
Yeah its true and they are going to have a really hard time with out neymar and silva
Yeah certainly, bad calls and bad playing can be dangerous after the game
Yes that's for sure. Epically since ozil announced that he would not be fasting for ramidan
I don't even know who i want to win in Brazil- Germany. Brazil had been so cynical and divey but Germany was god awful to watch against France
Costa Rica!!!!!
Today I'm rooting for Belgium and Costa Rica
I can't root for Belgium
I didn't think i could either, i fully expected to be rooting for Argentina today but for some reason i want Belgium to win now that I'm actually watching
Fuck Argentina and messi
That is how i feel
I think I'm gona go to pasqualies, that is a carry out place if you wana join , I'll buy u a beer
They have tables and tvs
Thanks for the invite but Laura just made lunch so I'm probably just going to stay here. If i do go out I'll text you though
Ok good deal
Arjen Robben is literally a bag of shit
Holy shit!!!!
Costa Ricans are gods chosen people
I was about to text u the same thing about robben
He must be a sociopath and also he should go to hell
My god Costa Rica deserves this
The Dutch are all such seasoned actors, robben just has been marinating longer
You're right and Netherlands absolutely does not deserve to win this
I didn't totally hate them before but this game has sealed the deal
I hate robben so much he is such a dishonest shit
He has been diving all tournament but now it is at its fever pitch as is my enmity toward him
How can someone be so shameless
He has been diving his whole career from what I gather
Because he wins
How have the refs not caught on?
They are probably paid off
Its weird because in MLS if you dive a lot you get a reputation and you stop getting calls even if they are legit
This ain't the MLS
They should bring their officiating up to the level of MLS
I say that tongue in cheek a little but its insane to me that he can get away with constant diving as a career skill
That is hilarious, I feel the World Cup officiating has been very inconsistent
I agree with that
And i have yet to see a card for simulation
He even admired to it in a press conference!!!
What was Costa Rica ranked at the start of the World Cup ?
I'm not sure but they have been lighting it up
Hahahaha
What a terrible call
Yeah the officiating is fucked
That could have been red
Why wasn't that a red?
Hahahaha
The ref is a coward, that is why
He doesn't have the constitution to do his duty
Holy shit
Game is nuts
It's such a clear cut case of good vs evil
It has never been more clear
In May FIFA ranked Costa Rica 35th in the world
I hope robben hurts himself in the run up and misses
There is no justice in the world
Their never was
It is good to be reminded that god is dead
Yup
Is it possible that all four teams left can lose?
I wish
